actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to require United States Government representatives to present to the Government of Iraq a plan to establish an oil trust.
short_title: Support for Iraq Oil Trust Act of 2009

summary.text: Support for Iraq Oil Trust Act of 2009 - Withholds specified percentages of Economic Support Fund assistance for Iraq unless the Secretary of State certifies within specified time periods to the appropriate congressional committees that U.S. government representatives have presented an oil trust plan to Iraqi government representatives.

titles.title: Support for Iraq Oil Trust Act of 2009
A bill to require United States Government representatives to present to the Government of Iraq a plan to establish an oil trust.
